titlealts.searchtitle: Data Element: CONTACT EMAIL ADDRESS (PATIENT OR LEAD CONTACT) - Description

div.p: CONTACT EMAIL ADDRESS (PATIENT OR LEAD CONTACT) is the same as attribute COMMUNICATION CONTACT STRING where the COMMUNICATION CONTACT METHOD is National Code 'Internet e-Mail Address'.
CONTACT EMAIL ADDRESS (PATIENT OR LEAD CONTACT) is the email address of the PATIENT or the PATIENT's lead contact who is the designated contact.
